name: Blender-style OpenGL GUI Lib
short_description: LibBlendGUI: Cross platform OpenGL GUI library based on Blender3D's GUI source code, implemented in C/C++ with strong emphasis on object oriented design. More details will be made available during the next days via the project's webpage.
